sentences: Simon Ravn (born 25 January 1974 in Copenhagen, Denmark) is a Danish composer who composes orchestral music for film, television and video games.
In the late 1980s and early 1990s, he wrote music in the MOD format under the pseudonym "Melomaniac", and scored music for the Amiga game, Foundation.
The Crumbs: A Very Crumby Christmas
Flaming Love - also known as Anja og Viktor - Brændende Kærlighed
In Sickness and in Health - also known as Anja & Viktor:
